item.description:
Ladies!

Have fun with your workout! Join us for a girls only Boot(y) Camp on September 22 at Kadanse! Feel free to come for 1, 2, or all 3! Please arrive a few minutes early and wear comfortable workout clothes and sneakers.  Our first Booty Camp this winter was lots of fun and we are hoping to top it!

11:30am - session 1: Burlesque in the Ballroom a unique workout, just for us girls...bring a tie, a towel, and be ready for fun

12:15pm - session 2: Booty, Belly, Barre a non-cardio, floor-based workout to sculpt ballerina legs without pressure on your joints

1pm - session 3: Fabulous Feet: Point & flex with Fitz!

 

**$15 per session (45 min each), $40 for all 3. No partner needed. It’s all about you!

 

Feel free to contact me here or at the studio.

Have a great week!

Kelley

Kadanse

781-27-DANCE * info@kadanse.com * www.kadanse.com

group.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group

item.name: Booty Camp 2012 .... a dance day for the ladies! Part Trois
